key.name: available-search-engines
key.description: Dictionary of all available search engines. The search engines' keys are djb2 hashes of their names. For example, "20a9e6cd" is the key for "DuckDuckGo". Each search engine must have the "name" and "urlTemplate" properties. By default, DuckDuckGo and Wikipedia (en) are available.

key.name: enabled-search-engines
key.description: List of enabled search engines, in order of preference. Search engines are identified by the djb2 hash of their name. Default values are (1.) "20a9e6cd" for "DuckDuckGo" and (2.) "53873daa" for "Wikipedia (en)".
